spectrogram_interaction.en:
Click on the cells of this grid to regenerate the underlying zone in the spectrogram.

You can activate multiple cells at once by clicking and dragging on the grid.

drag-n-drop.en:
You can also drag and drop a sound file from your computer anywhere onto the app to import it and transform it thereafter.

Imported sounds will be automatically cropped to 1min.

constraints.en:
These icons define the constraints used when performing regeneration operations.

Set the values then select a region of the spectrogram to regenerate it with the chosen options.

edit_tools.en:
Selects the edit tool for regeneration.

Hover over the icons to see more details for each tool.
